code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import'./LoadingScreen.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoadingScreen=_ref=>{let{onLoadingComplete}=_ref;const[progress,setProgress]=useState(0);useEffect(()=>{const timer=setInterval(()=>{setProgress(prev=>{if(prev>=100){clearInterval(timer);setTimeout(()=>onLoadingComplete(),500);return 100;}return prev+2;});},30);return()=>clearInterval(timer);},[onLoadingComplete]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{className:"loading-screen",initial:{opacity:1},exit:{opacity:0},transition:{duration:0.5},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"loading-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{className:"loading-logo",animate:{scale:[1,1.2,1],rotate:[0,360,0]},transition:{duration:2,repeat:Infinity},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo-circle",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"logo-text",children:"YR"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.h2,{initial:{opacity:0,y:20},animate:{opacity:1,y:0},transition:{delay:0.3},children:"Crafting Digital Experiences"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-bar",style:{width:"".concat(progress,"%")},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"progress-text",children:[progress,"%"]})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.p,{className:"loading-text",animate:{opacity:[0.5,1,0.5]},transition:{duration:1.5,repeat:Infinity},children:"Loading awesome content..."})]})});};export default LoadingScreen;
